title: Cycle logic - cycle safety
creator_credit: F M Productions and Aerospace Audio-Visual Services
brief_description: Demonstrates safe operation and handling of motor-cycles. Shows how to start, clutch, brake and accelerate. Explains anticipation riding in entering intersections, taking curves, changing lanes, keeping safe distances and avoiding road hazards. Covers city, country road and freeway conditions. Also stresses the importance of protective clothing and good posture.
